setting.about: As a Software Engineer I have 5-year hand on experience in front end and Backend development. abilities.title: Php

education.title: BS (hons). Software Engineering
education.description:
As a software engineer i'm professional in designing, developing, testing, and maintaining the software systems. I'm responsible for creating efficient and reliable computer programs, applications, and operating systems that are used in a variety of industries, including healthcare, finance, transportation, and entertainment.

As a Software engineers I uses many programming languages like PHP, Laravel Framework, Node JS, React JS, Vue JS, HTML as well as tools like integrated development environments (IDEs) and version control systems to create software that meets the needs of users and businesses.

projects.title: Online Auction
projects.description: Auction gives you an opportunity to invest in exclusive and rare properties. It also guides you to buy properties safely and securely !Thinking about what? register yourself as an investor today.

projects.title: Property and Business Listing Portal
projects.description:
To sell any type of business and asset in the fastest, most efficient, and safe manner, banks, liquidation firms, corporates can dispose of a variety of assets being commercial and industrial as quickly as possible.
The most important point of buying or selling at auction is speed, with the majority of the work undertaken prior to the auction commencing. Using this effective method of sale to UAE and Dubai is Response Auctioneer Vision. Auction is far more than selling an asset, it is timing, and ability to build immediate trust with the buyers and sellers a relaxed friendly attitude that makes bidders more comfortable, and intimate knowledge of the product being offered and of the current market conditions and apply, a thorough understanding of the law and above all to generate the most from the buyers.

projects.title: MAA Foundation
projects.description: MAA Foundation was launched in March 2020, in response to the ever growing rise in cancer related deaths in the third world. This is the reality for thousands of cancer patients in Azad Kashmir today – and in Aliya Begum’s memory – and in the memory of all those who have lost a loved one through this debilitating disease, we aim to bring relief to those who are trapped between poverty and cancer.

projects.title: The Royal Game
projects.description:
THE ROYAL GAME is a Global Bespoke Luxury Concierge Company with Headquarters in Dubai, UAE. Since 2016, the company offers high-quality, highly tailored Concierge services to High-Net-Worth Individuals and Ultra HNWI and Corporate Companies all around the world.

We organize, plan and book all your requests, from Home Holidays, Yachts, Executive Drivers, Exotic Experiences, Holiday Planning, Private Jets, Helicopter Tours, Fine Dining, Private and Corporate Events, only to mention a few, providing our clients with the true meaning of exclusivity and a red carpet experience. 

We serve clients from all over the world, from Business Entrepreneurs to Celebrities who all enjoy a level of success in their own field, that’s the reason why our motto is to exceed expectations from the ordinary.

We are an International team with multicultural background and understand Luxury Lifestyle and can cater to all 24/7.
